name: Hunter in the Forest
description:
Play as the Hunter on his journey through several locations in his forest.

We tried to make it funny and we will update it a lot.

For now there is only a german version of it but we will release the English version as soon as possible!

At the moment there is only a singleplayer mode but we are working on coop and multiplayer.

Also the game is packed in a .rar file. You will need a program (e.g. WinRar) to unzip it.

Good Luck & Have Fun!

German audio only at the moment.
